mapper.select: SELECT t1.project_name AS projectName, (IFNULL(SUM(t1.renovationNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.toBeReservedNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.reservedNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.partRentNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.wholeRentNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.returned4ReservedNum),0) + IFNULL(SUM(t1.damagedNum),0)) AS totalNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.renovationNum),0) AS renovationNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.toBeReservedNum),0) AS toBeReservedNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.reservedNum),0) AS reservedNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.partRentNum),0) AS partRentNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.wholeRentNum),0) AS wholeRentNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.returned4ReservedNum),0) AS returned4ReservedNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.damagedNum),0) AS damagedNum FROM(SELECT t.project_name, CASE t.status WHEN '0' THEN t.num END AS renovationNum , CASE t.STATUS WHEN '1' THEN t.num END AS toBeReservedNum , CASE t.STATUS WHEN '2' THEN t.num END AS reservedNum , CASE t.STATUS WHEN '3' THEN t.num END AS partRentNum , CASE t.STATUS WHEN '4' THEN t.num END AS wholeRentNum , CASE t.STATUS WHEN '5' THEN t.num END AS returned4ReservedNum, CASE t.STATUS WHEN '6' THEN t.num END AS damagedNum FROM( SELECT tpp.project_name, th.`house_status` AS STATUS , COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM t_house th LEFT JOIN t_property_project tpp ON tpp.id = th.property_project_id AND tpp.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' WHERE th.`PROPERTY_PROJECT_ID` = #{propertyProject.id} AND th.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' GROUP BY th.`HOUSE_STATUS`)t )t1
